form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION TO FILE PETITION FOR NATURALIZATION, 44 63

full_text: 434463 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Form Approved IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE OMB NO. 43-R0079 FEE STAMP APPLICATION TO FILE PETITION FOR NATURALIZATION Mail or take to: IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE 15633 4/15/80 2:00 1. ALIEN REGISTRATION Show the exact spelling of your name as it appears on your alien registration (See INSTRUCTIONS BE SURE YOU UNDERSTAND EACH receipt card, and the number of your card. If you did got register, so state.) QUESTION BEFORE YOU ANSWER IT. PLEASE PRINT OR Name YING KUO-HAN TYPE.) No. A20 535147 Section of Law 316(A) Date: (Leave Blank) (1) My full true and correct name is YING, KUO-HAN - (Pull true name without abbreviations) (2) I now live at 2221 S. Annadel Ave. Rowland Heights, CA. 91748 (Number and street, city, county. state, zip code) (3) I was born on 12 25 14 in SHANGHAI , CHINA (Month) (Day) (Year) City or town) County. province, or state) (Country) (4) I request that my name be changed to LEO, KUO-HAN YING (5) Other names I have used are: NONE (Include maiden name) Sex: Male Female (6) My father's name YING, CHEN DAI (7). My mother's maiden LEE name (8) Was your father or mother ever a United States citizen? Yes No (If "Yes", explain fully) (9) Can you read and write English? Yes No (10) Can you speak English? Yes No (11) Can you sign your name in English? Yes No (12) My lawful admission for permanent residence was on 3 19 74 under the name of YING, KUD - HAN Month) (Day) (Year) at LOS ANGELES, CALIF. on (City) (State) CHINA AIRLINE (Name of ship. airline or adjustment of status) (13) Since that date I have resided continuously in the United States and continuously in the State of CALIFORNIA where I now live since 1-5-75 During the last five years I have been physically present in the United States for a total of 68 months. (14) In what places in the United States have you lived during the last 5 years? List present address FIRST. FROM To STREET ADDRESS CITY AND STATE (a) JAN 1975 PRESENT TIME 2221 5 Annadei Ave. ROWLAND HEIGHTS CAUF (b) AVE 19.23 JAN 1925 315 GRANDAVE, ALHAMBRA, CALIF. (c) 19 19 (d) 19 19 (15) (a) Have you been out of the United States sincesyou lawful admission as a permanent resident? Yes No If "Yes" fill in the following information for every absence of less than 6 months. no matter how short it was. NAME OF SHIP. OR OF AIRLINE. RAILROAD COMPANY Bus DATE DEPARTED DATE RETURNED COMPANY. OR OTHER MEANS USED TO RETURN TO THE PLACE OR PORT OF ENTRY THROUGH WHICH You UNITED STATES RETURNED TO THE UNITED STATES (b) Since your lawful admission, have you been out of the United States for a period of 6 months or longer? Yes No If "No", state "None"; If "Yes", fill in following information for every absence of more than 6 months. NAME OF SHIP OR OF AIRLINE. RAILROAD COMPANY BUS DATE DEPARTED DATE RETURNED COMPANY, OR OTHER MEANS USED TO RETURN TO THE PLACE OR PORT OF ENTRY THROUGH WHICH You UNITED STATES RETURNED TO THE UNITED STATES (16) Do you intend to reside permanently in the United States? Yes No If "No," explain: Form N-400 (Rev. 9-1-78) (OVER) (1)
